plot: Young siblings run away from what they used to call home and embark on a surreal journey, following the sun, in order to find their mother at their special meeting place.
title: The Mirrors of the Sun
plot_es: Young siblings run away from what they used to call home and embark on a surreal journey, following the sun, in order to find their mother at their special meeting place.
plot_en: Young siblings run away from what they used to call home and embark on a surreal journey, following the sun, in order to find their mother at their special meeting place.
